thread.title: Is the Peak TV Era Ready for Pot Channels?

author: Joe Flint
title: Is the Peak TV Era Ready for Pot Channels?
text:
With marijuana-centric shows like HBO’s “High Maintenance” and Netflix’s “Disjointed,” and seemingly constant references to the drug on other mainstream television series, it would seem the time is right for a channel devoted to those who like to get high.
But as entrepreneurs Dan Goman and Alex Nahai are learning with 420TV, their Beverly Hills, Calif.-based video-on-demand and streaming service, there are hurdles upon hurdles when it comes to cannabis content.
... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
